hanzi-su-wiki:
呈

Значения

Подносить, преподносить, выставлять (напоказ); преподносить вышестоящему, докладывать, доносить, сообщать

Мнемоника

Докладывать 口 правителю 王.
purpleculture_pinyin:
chéng
to present to a superior; memorial; petition; to present (a certain appearance); to assume (a shape); to be (a certain color)
представить вышестоящему руководителю; мемориал; петиция; представить (определенная внешность); принять (форму); быть (определенного цвета)
rtega_mnemonic:
呈呈RSsubmit, show, appear, petition
  • speak 口 to the ruler 王: submitting one's plan
purpleculture_info: Ideographic: To speak 口 before a king 王
purpleculture_examples:
呈现 [ chéng xiàn ]: to appear; to emerge; to present (a certain appearance); to demonstrate
辞呈 [ cí chéng ]: (written) resignation
呈报 [ chéng bào ]: to (submit a) report
纷呈 [ fēn chéng ]: brilliant and varied; (often in the combination 精彩纷呈 )
呈文 [ chéng wén ]: petition (submitted to a superior)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 口 [ kǒu ] mouth; entrance, gate, opening
    • 王 [ wáng ] king, ruler; royal; surname
heisig_chinese_memo: You must submit to any word that comes out of the king's mouth.
heisig_story: The trick to remembering this character lies in associating the key word with the line from the nursery rhyme about 4 and 20 blackbirds baked in a pie: "Wasn't this a dainty dish to set before the king?" If we think of display in terms of that famous line, and the king with his head thrown back and his mouth wide open as 4 and 20 blackbirds fly in one after the other, we shall have satisfied both the elements and their position.
koohiiStory1: The mouth of the king is displaying his bling.
koohiiStory2: What a pathetic display! The king is sprawled on his throne, head back and mouth wide open, fast asleep. We should never have let him drink so much at that banquet last night.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The Mouth King, who is just one big mouth, has one skill, and that is to present. That big mouth is always presenting something.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine the Mouth King giving a presentation about the importance of mouths. His subjects all flatter him by saying, "Please, please, present to us about mouths again! We truuuuuuly love it!"
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: "I will present to you a presentation about mouths, but I require energy. Please fill my giant mouth body with delicious tater (てい) tots.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You pour a bucket of tater tots into his mouth body and he continues his presentation about mouths. "You see, mouths are just orifices..."
Ru_trainchinese: chéng: (глаг/сущ) показывать, являть, принимать (напр., какую-л. форму)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the king's (王) mouth (口) is always on display
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: You must submit to any word that comes out of the king's mouth.
humanum_full_description_en:
ancient seal "was Zhi", " in a " pass though they " succeed ", pronounced "chi succeed," that means reaching aspirations, feel pleasure. Chu bamboo slips pretend to be " Ying ", "Guodian Chu Slips. Lao Zi Jia, Jane 10: "Those who protect this way do not want to be (surplus) often."

"Said Wen": "Cheng, Ping Ye. Sound from the mouth."
humanum_short_description_en: Oracle is used from "囗" from " shi ", " shi " is like an axe, the original meaning of the configuration is unknown, oracle bone inscriptions are used as place names. " Was " the word to become Xiaozhuan from " 𡈼 ", " 𡈼 " is " very beginning of the text" is " was " sound character.
humanum_full_description:
古璽「呈志」，「呈」通假作「逞」，讀作「逞志」，表示達成心志，感到快意。楚簡通假作「盈」，《郭店楚簡．老子甲》簡10：「保此道者，不欲常呈(盈)」。

　　《說文》：「呈，平也。从口𡈼聲。」
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文從「囗」從「士」，「士」象斧鉞之形，構形本義不明，甲骨文用為地名。「呈」字至小篆變為從「𡈼」，「𡈼」是「挺」的初文，是「呈」的聲符。

呈字的基本解释

呈
chéng
显出，露出：呈现。呈祥。
恭敬地送上去：呈上。呈报。面呈。
下级报告上级的文件：呈文。呈子。
古同“程”，规划、法式、标准。

呈字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chéng］
［《廣韻》直貞切，平清，澄。］
(1)显现；显露。
(2)送上，呈报。
(3)旧时的上行文书。
(4)控告。
(5)通“程”。限额。
(6)通“程”。准则，法则。
(7)用同“承”。参见“呈頭”。
(8)姓。《古今印薮》有呈绅。
[②]［chéng］
［《廣韻》直正切，去勁，澄。］
自衒。参见“呈2身”。
[③]［chěng］
［《集韻》丑郢切，上静，徹。］
通“逞1”。
恣意。

呈字的英文翻译

◎ 呈
assume, submit

呈字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　呈； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页181第17
【唐韻】直貞切【集韻】馳貞切【韻會】馳成切，?音程。【說文】平也。从口?聲。　又【玉篇】解也。　又【廣韻】示也，見也。【正韻】露也。　又姓。【正字通】古今印藪有呈紳。　又與程通。【史記·秦始皇紀】上至以衡石量書，日夜有呈，不中呈不得休息。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?直正切，音鄭。【廣韻】自媒衒。【唐書·韋澳傳】恐無呈身御史。　又【集韻】丑郢切，音騁。與逞同，通也。一曰快也。

【集韻】㞷古作呈。註詳屮部四畫。　又【字彙補】古文狂字。註詳犬部四畫。　【郭氏正誤】呈，从王从口。與呈字異。呈字从?。
呈字的源字形

呈字的起名意思

：一般指奉献，献出，如呈献；也指显出，露出，显露，如显示才华。

Name meaning
: Generally refers to dedication, to give, such as presenting; also refers to showing, revealing, revealing, such as showing talent.
呈
会意字。从口、从壬(ting),像一个人站在土堆上并张大口,表示显出、露出之意。本义是显出、露出。

Чувство s1euii
chéng
I гл.
1) офиц. рапортом доносить; докладывать; представлять (что-л. начальнику)
呈阅 представить для ознакомления
2) офиц. подавать заявление, жалобу, обращаться с заявлением (от частного лица в учреждение)
呈了公事了 подал заявление (жалобу)
3) являть, проявлять; показывать; предлагать
呈见 предлагать для обозрения
呈质 проявлять свою сущность
4) проявляться, вскрываться, обнаруживаться
5) иметь вид (форму)
果实呈圆形 плоды имеют круглую форму
II сущ.
1) рапорт; доклад; прошение; заявление; петиция
2) Чэн (фамилия)
Radicals: 口, 王  (mouth, king)
Meaning Mnemonic
The Mouth King, who is just one big mouth, has one skill, and that is to present. That big mouth is always presenting something.
Imagine the Mouth King giving a presentation about the importance of mouths. His subjects all flatter him by saying, "Please, please, present to us about mouths again! We truuuuuuly love it!"
Reading Mnemonic
"I will present to you a presentation about mouths, but I require energy. Please fill my giant mouth body with delicious tater (てい) tots.
You pour a bucket of tater tots into his mouth body and he continues his presentation about mouths. "You see, mouths are just orifices..."
